explains: adj. 牵强的，难以置信的

sentences.en: The whole story sounds very far-fetched.
sentences.cn: 整个叙述听起来很难以置信。

sentences.en: The storyline was too far-fetched and none of the actors was particularly good.
sentences.cn: 故事情节太牵强，而且没有一个演员特别出色。

sentences.en: Rumours of a takeover by Hanson are probably far-fetched, but the company is worried about other predators.
sentences.cn: 被汉森公司收购的谣言可能是捕风捉影，但公司仍担心其他觊觎者。
